HAI 2026 Call for Posters

Register your poster

The Healthcare AI Symposium 2026 invites undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral students to submit posters presenting their translational research aligned with the theme “Designing the Future of Intelligent Health: Advancing Healthcare Through AI, MedTech, and Digital Systems”. This is an opportunity to share their research work and engage with researchers, clinicians, and industry leaders.



Topics

- AI-driven Diagnostics, Monitoring and Triage

- Agentic AI for Healthcare

- Digital Health, Clinical Informatics, and Medical Data Science

- Medical Image Analysis and Computer Vision

- MedTech and Medical Devices

- Multimodal Learning and Foundation Models

- Safety, Fairness, and Evaluation of Clinical AI Systems

- Signal Processing and Physiological Measurements

Important Dates

Abstract Submission Deadline:

Tuesday, 31 March 2026

Notification of Acceptance:

Friday, 29 May 2026

Registration Deadline:

Monday, 15 June 2026

Poster Session:

Wednesday, 8 July 2026 & Thursday, 9 July 2026

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Eligibility

Students from all backgrounds (engineering, computer science, biomedical sciences, public health, medicine, and related fields) are encouraged to submit. Collaborative or interdisciplinary work is welcomed.

Submission Guidelines

Please submit a 1 page sumamary using the IEEE conference template: https://www.ieee.org/conferences/publishing/templates

Evaluation

Submissions will be evaluated based on scholarly merit, clarity, innovation, methodological rigor, and potential impact in healthcare applications. Accepted posters will be presented during the dedicated poster session.

Important dates

Submission deadline: TBD; Notification of acceptance: TBD; Poster session: 8-9 July 2026
